title: MAGIX Movie Edit Pro 2013 Premium 12.0.3.4 + Addons [ChingLiu]
description:
Important changes in version 12.0.3.4 compared to 12.0.2.2:

* Import projects from Movie Edit Touch
* Small bugs fixed:
-Import and Export
-Preview rendering
-Display errors in certain mix situations
-Effect handling
-Audio recording
-Video recording
* Compatibility adjustments for Terratec cards on Windows 8
* Move markers in the timeline for precise positioning
